title: Tim Kaine: ‘The Catholic Church Will Change Its Same-Sex Marriage Stance or It Will Be Banned from the U.S.’
subtitle: A report that Democratic VP candidate Tim Kaine threatened to ban the Catholic Church from the U.S. if they didn't change their stance on gay marriage was fake news.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Tim Kaine threatened to ban the Catholic Church from the United States if they didn't change their stance on gay marriage.
